SESSION_ID.description: Put yourr SESSION_ID here. Make sure it starts with Byte;;;, or get session id from here, https://webpair-ben-nothing.onrender.com

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Bot will all status, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

MODE.description: Bot mode can be public, private, inbox or groups in small letters (e.g, public)

AUTO_REPLY.description: Bot will reply to the msgs like gm, gn, love you, hate you, hi, etc... To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ANTIBOT.description: Set true to Automatically deletes bot commands sent by users and warns them.

ANTIBOT_REMOVE.description: Set true to Deletes bot commands and instantly removes the user from the group.

ANTIBOT_WARN.description: Set true to Deletes bot commands, warns the user up to 3 times, and removes them after the 3rd warning.

ANTILINK.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing links and warns the user.

ANTILINKREMOVE.description: Set true to Deletes link messages and instantly removes the user.

ANTILINKWARN.description: Set true to Warns the user up to 3 times for sending links before removal.

ANTIBAD.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing bad words and warns the user.

ANTIBAD_REMOVE.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing bad words warns the useramd delete user

ANTIBAD_WARN.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing bad words warns the user. 3 warnings after removed user

AUTO_DL.description: Set true to Automatically downloads media (Facebook, titkok, Instagram, YouTube) from specific link.

AUTO_REACT.description: Bot will react to the msgs, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)
